title: ADD_TEXT_COMPONENT_FLOAT
content:
0xE7DCB5B874BCD96E0x24D78013// AddTextComponentFloat
void ADD_TEXT_COMPONENT_FLOAT(float value, int decimalPlaces);Parameters:value: The number to substitute in the label.decimalPlaces: How many decimal places to addAdds a float to a text component placeholder, replacing ~1~ in the current text command's text label.Examples:Lua-- on initialization
AddTextEntry('TEST_LABEL', 'Label: ~1~')

-- when drawing
BeginTextCommandThefeedPost('TEST_LABEL')
AddTextComponentFloat(1000.0, 2)
EndTextCommandThefeedPostTicker(false, true)
codeBlocks:
// AddTextComponentFloat
void ADD_TEXT_COMPONENT_FLOAT(float value, int decimalPlaces);

-- on initialization
AddTextEntry('TEST_LABEL', 'Label: ~1~')

-- when drawing
BeginTextCommandThefeedPost('TEST_LABEL')
AddTextComponentFloat(1000.0, 2)
EndTextCommandThefeedPostTicker(false, true)
